[Main] Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Add 1 card with the [SoC] trait among them to the hand. Return the rest to the bottom of the deck. If this effect added to a hand, trash 1 card in your hand. Then, place this card in the battle area.
[Main] ＜Delay＞ (After this card is placed, by trashing it the next turn or later, activate the effect below).
・You may play 1 card with the [SoC] trait from your trash with the play cost reduced by 2.
source_effect: Security Effect [Security] Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Add 1 card with the [SoC] trait among them to the hand. Return the rest to the bottom of the deck. If this effect added to a hand, trash 1 card in your hand. Then, place this card in the battle area.

name: Thunderflame Crusher

name: Quantumon
main_effect:
[When Digivolving] By placing 1 Digimon on top of its owner's security stack, reveal all of your opponent's security cards, and place 1 card among them on top of your opponent's deck. Shuffle the rest and return them to the security stack.
[Start of Opponent's Turn] Declare 1 card category. Then, reveal the top card of your opponent's deck. If it's of that category, this Digimon isn't affected by that category's effects, other than this Digimon's effects, for the turn. Return the revealed cards to the top or bottom of your opponent's deck.
set_name: LM-01: Limited Card Pack Digimon Ghost Game
